TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabPage extends System.Windows.Forms.Panel

summary.span: 表示 中的單一索引標籤頁。

span.span: Represents a single tab page in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項代表索引標籤式的頁面控制項。 controls represent the tabbed pages in a control. 中的索引標籤頁的順序集合會反映在索引標籤的順序控制項。The order of tab pages in the collection reflects the order of tabs in the control. 若要變更控制項中的索引標籤的順序，您必須移除並插入它們在新的索引，藉以變更集合中的位置。To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes. 控制項都會受到其容器，因此部分屬性繼承自基底類別不會影響，包括， ， ， ， ，和。 controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the base class will have no effect, including , , , , , and . 中的索引標籤屬於但不是個別的一部份控制項。The tabs in a are part of the but not parts of the individual controls. 成員類別，例如屬性，會影響只有用戶端矩形的索引標籤頁，但不是索引標籤。Members of the class, such as the property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs. 此外，方法不會隱藏 索引標籤。若要隱藏 索引標籤，您必須移除控制項從集合。Additionally, the method of the will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the control from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，[] 索引標籤被視為屬於 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時和事件發生。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，和事件不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但唯有在焦點進入或離開索引標籤頁的用戶端矩形。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 如需有關此控制項如何回應和方法，請參閱下列成員： ， ， ， ， ， .For more information about how this control responds to the and methods, see the following members: , , , , , . > [!NOTE] > 所包含的控制項不會顯示索引標籤頁面，並在這些控制項中的任何資料繫結不會啟動，直到索引標籤頁面會顯示在之前建立。Controls contained in a are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown. 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、屬性可讓您指出背景索引標籤頁面是否應該轉譯使用目前的視覺化樣式。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style. 發生這種情況只當和屬性值都`true`和屬性之父代是。This occurs only when the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent is . 否則，繪製背景正常。Otherwise, the background is painted normally. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立與一個。The following code example creates a with one . 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值屬性是值屬性除非和屬性值都`true`和屬性之父代的值為的情況下的預設值屬性是。The default value of the property is the value of the property unless the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent has a value of , in which case the default value of the property is . 子控制項置於繼承根據預設，因此這個行為會導致子系的背景與目前的視覺化樣式呈現控制項的值。Child controls that you place on the inherit the value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style. 值變更屬性會自動設定屬性`false`。Changing the value of the property automatically sets the property to `false`. 如果您想背景來呈現使用視覺化樣式，但您想要繼承的子控制項您所指定值，設定屬性設定之後屬性。If you want the background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a value that you specify, set the property after you set the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEnter(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnEnter (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，[] 索引標籤被視為屬於 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時和事件發生。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，和事件不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但唯有在焦點進入或離開索引標籤頁的用戶端矩形。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

The tab order of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出當使用者按下 TAB 鍵在表單上接收焦點的控制項的順序。The property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form. 控制項內含控制項，不過，並不會接收焦點分別做為表單的定位順序的一部分。 controls are contained within controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order. 這個屬性是因此這個類別沒有任何意義。This property is therefore meaningless for this class.

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在索引標籤上的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display on the tab.

value.span: 要顯示在索引標籤上的文字。

span.span: The text to display on the tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更屬性值不會自動置中 索引標籤上的新值如果具有屬性值為。Changing the property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the has a property value of . 您可以藉由設定解決這項限制屬性或藉由移除從集合，並將它加入至集合的備份。You can work around this limitation by setting the property or by removing the from the collection and adding it back to the collection. 這兩種動作將會自動文字置中。Both of these actions will automatically center the text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立與一個。The following code example creates a with one . 屬性設定索引標籤頁面文字`myTabPage`。The property sets the tab page text to `myTabPage`. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. summary.span: 取得或設定這個索引標籤的工具提示文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this tab.

value.span: 這個索引標籤的工具提示文字。

span.span: The ToolTip text for this tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此索引標籤頁面屬於。This tab page belongs to a . 使用者的滑鼠經過索引標籤如果時顯示工具提示文字的屬性是`true`。The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the property of the is `true`. 如需工具提示的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about ToolTips, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立具有兩個物件。The following code example creates a with two objects. 設為允許工具提示和索引標籤頁指派工具提示文字。The is set to allow ToolTips, and the tab pages are assigned ToolTip text. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseVisualStyleBackColor { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出啟用視覺化樣式時是否使用目前的視覺化樣式呈現 背景。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.

value.span: 表示使用目前的視覺化樣式呈現背景，否則為 。

span.span: to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 背景會使用目前的視覺化樣式時，才和屬性值都`true`。The background uses the current visual style only when the and property values are both `true`. 當和屬性值都`true`和屬性之父代是的預設值屬性是。When the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent is , the default value of the property is . 子控制項置於繼承根據預設，因此這個行為會導致子系的背景與目前的視覺化樣式呈現控制項的值。Child controls that you place on the inherit the value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style. 值變更屬性會自動設定屬性`false`。Changing the value of the property automatically sets the property to `false`. 如果您想背景來呈現使用視覺化樣式，但您想要繼承的子控制項您所指定值，設定屬性設定之後屬性。If you want the background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a value that you specify, set the property after you set the property.
